summary.title: Software Developer
description: I hold a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and bring extensive experience as a software developer. My expertise lies in Angular 2, Node.js, Electron, and other JavaScript technologies. Over the past four years, I have been working on Angular 2+ projects based on the Electron platform.

In my senior-level role in front-end development, I led the design and implementation of user interfaces, focusing on high performance and accessibility across multiple platforms. My deep understanding of JavaScript has been crucial in driving successful outcomes.
I am confident that my coding background equips me to tackle any challenge and contribute to our company's success. I look forward to collaborating with the team to achieve great results.

description.title: Deployed a Node.js library server
description.body: using Docker, ensuring scalable and reliable server management.

description.title: Developed an Angular front-end platform
description.body: based on user stories, utilizing Angular FormControl to dynamically load JSON data for improved user interaction.

description.title: Configured AWS CodePipeline for CI/CD
description.body: enabling automated deployments and increasing development efficiency by 70%

description.title: Implemented Cypress for end-to-end automated testing
description.body: resulting in a 30% increase in testing efficiency and more robust application quality.

description.title: Upgraded the project from Angular 15 to Angular 17
description.body: modernizing outdated code and achieving a 90% improvement in build efficiency, which facilitated the team`s transition to writing code in the latest Angular 17 style.
This is a contract-based software company that provides software services for Corel, Acer, and other companies.
I am primarily responsible for the projects:

description.title: Node Framework Setup
description.body: Established the foundation for a Node framework using NestJS and Configured Swagger to generate API documentation, resulting in a 50% improvement in team communication efficiency.

description.title: Cloud Service Deployment
description.body: Published a photo cloud service on AWS Elastic Beanstalk using Docker. Developed a cloud-based photo file system utilizing AWS S3.

description.title: Infrastructure Configuration
description.body: Set up SNS and SQS for service notifications on the AWS infrastructure.and Implemented IAM in the CI/CD pipeline for cryptography, ensuring the security of the system.

description.title: Multiro cutter
description.body: I developed a member system using .NET Core and Angular 2. used the IdentityServer4 framework to manage user accounts and implemented third-party logins using the OAuth2 protocol, including Google and Apple logins.

description.title: Paint Shop Pro 2022
description.body: Developed a photo editing software using the Angular 2 framework and canvas-based technology.Designed and implemented various UI/UX theme styles to enhance accessibility.

description.title: Planet9 Desktop
description.body: Developed applications for the League of Legends (LOL) game using GraphQL and Angular 2. Built a UI component library using Angular Material. Developed a shared component to display icons by importing data for heroes, skills, mastery, and items.Created a tool that allows users to import the Mastery Tree into the game with a single click.Developed a Windows desktop application using Angular 2 and Electron. ngular2 and electron developed windows desktop app

description.title: Campus AI Competition Official Website (Angular):
description.body: Developed and designed the CSS and HTML layout for the entire web page.and integrated RESTful APIs to bind and render data within Angular components.

description.title: Showcase Design Platform:
description.body: Created and designed the CSS and HTML layout for the entire web page.and implemented the BEM methodology as the coding style specification for CSS.
